Detailed Description

Node class for geometry shells.

A geometry shell is a heavy instance of another scene node. It is a deep copy of the world space geometry with its own unique materials.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzGeometryShellNode::DzGeometryShellNode (  ) 

Default Constructor. Creates a shell with DzObject, DzPushModifier, and DzGeometryShellShape. This is the preferred way to create a shell node.

DzGeometryShellNode::DzGeometryShellNode ( bool  isSceneLoad  ) 

Default Constructor. Creates just a shell node with a DzObject, no push modifier.
